  • Horseradish slaw

    July 23rd, 2017 

    So Maguire got tired
Of the no-target gun fired
And returned to his headland of carrots and cabbage
To the fields once again
Where eunuchs can be men
And life is more lousy than savage.

    The Great Hunger Patrick Kavanagh

  • Poached egg with porter-pickled squash

    July 10th, 2017 

    Rats get in too. Drink themselves bloated as big as a 
collie floating. Dead drunk on the porter . . . Imagine
drinking that!

    Ulysses James Joyce [Leopold Bloom thinking about porter]

I know times are changing
It's time we all reach out
For something new, that means you too

    Purple Rain Prince

  • Porter-pickled butternut squash

    June 26th, 2017 

    In the pubs for seven years
Men have given him their ears
Buying the essence of his heart
With a porter-perfumed fart

    Bank holiday Patrick Kavanagh

We are the swine
